meanings.sent1: The chawer enjoyed his meal slowly.
meanings.sent2: The little chawer chewed on a piece of gum.
meanings.sent3: The chawer's jaw muscles must be very strong!
meanings.sent4: She was a diligent chawer, savoring every bite.
meanings.sent5: The chawer's steady rhythm of chewing was mesmerizing.

meanings.sent1: I chawer my food thoroughly before swallowing.
meanings.sent2: The cows chawer their cud peacefully in the field.
meanings.sent3: He chawers like a cow when he eats slowly.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to chawer slowly as they waited for the results.
meanings.sent5: The old man chawered on his pipe, lost in thought.
